news_title: Sony's profit zooms to record on video games, 'Demon Slayer'
news_description: Sony’s January-March profit zoomed eight-fold to 107 billion yen, or $982 million from a year earlier, as people stuck at home during the coronavirus pandemic turned to the Japanese electronics and entertainment company’s video games and other visual content
